name: mysql-schema
description: Generate a JSON representing the schema of your MySQL database.

scripts.build: npm run docs && sudo npm link && npm shrinkwrap
scripts.upload: npm run build && npm run test && read -ep 'Message of the commit: ' text && git add . && git commit -m $text && git push
scripts.docs: javadoc -i src/*.js -o docs/README.api.md -f markdown && concat docs/README.ini.md docs/README.api.md docs/README.end.md -o README.md
